answers.answer: Having big babies could either be from genetics or diabetes. When I was 26 weeks, my baby has measured 2-3 weeks ahead every appointment. Even now being 40 weeks, baby measuring 42 weeks.Mine is just from genetics though. He's approximately weighing 8.13lbs and waiting for hospital to call for open room so I can be induced.I wouldn't worry about it too much though. You're body is made for pretty much everything going on.
okay thanks. It could be genetic because my husband is 6'3" and my dad, my sister and my brother are all 6' and taller. I am the shortest besides my mom.

well went to the doctor today and the stomach measurements that they do is measuring at 31wks. what I am worried about is that my mom and 4 aunts (all my mom's sisters) had problems with a soft cervix. Should I be worried being the doctor hasn't checked me for that?

question: I had an ultrasound done today to check on the baby because of my health issues from the past. The baby is measuring 4 weeks bigger than what he should. I am 26+3wks and my baby boy is measuring 30wks and is weighing 3lbs! Should I be worried about this? I am still waiting on the results of the Gestational Diabetes test that I took Friday.
title: Measuring 4 Weeks Bigger
